work.name: Stippl
work.summary: Co-founder and CTO of Stippl.io, the all in one adventure planner that helps travellers plan everything in one place. From research and inspiration to the perfect route, including accommodations, things to do and transportation.

work.name: ING Neo
work.summary:
Frontend Engineer, along the way picked up duties as Technical Product Owner & Scrum Master for the Frontend team.
Main topics:
  • TypeScript
  • React & React Native
  • Redux & Observables
    • Secondary topics:
  • Scala
  • DSLs
  • Code generation

work.name: ING Neo
work.summary:
After my Trainee rotations I started working in the ING Labs as a DevOps Engineer. In a small team I work on web applications for internal use and on consulting innovation teams on IT Architecture and the usage of public clouds. Main achievements:
  • Rebuilt one of our applications using Node.js and React
  • Migration of innovation teams from innovation environment into ING production environment
  • Set up our own continuous deployment pipeline (including continuous integration flow)
  • Set up automated testing
  • Introduced SonarQube in the development process
  • Led & executed the migration of VMs in private cloud environment to Docker on Microsoft Azure

work.name: ING International Talent Programme
work.summary: The ING International Talent Programme is a tailor-made four-year graduate programme. The first year consists of two short-term assignments, of which the second one is done abroad. After this year, Trainees go into their "fixed position" where they will work for a longer period of time.

work.name: International Advanced Analytics
work.summary: Short Term Assignment: for my second rotation as an IT I worked as a Blackbelt/Data Engineer in the International Advanced Analytics Team in Frankfurt.

volunteer.name: De Aalscholver
volunteer.summary: I was a trainer and coach of several teams, ranging from youth (<15, <17) to the women's senior team.

volunteer.name: Special Olympics Netherlands
volunteer.summary: Worked as a volunteer at the Special Olympics competitive swimming event in Almere.

awards.title: ING Talent Programma - IT Review group

basics.personalDescription: This is a longer description of me, of my backstory, my backyard, my backfire, my backend, my frontend and my friends.
